titleStmt.title: Jericho's downfal, in a sermon preached upon Jan. 31, 1688/89 being a day of publick thanksgiving to God for our deliverance from popery and arbitrary power / by Samuel Peck, Minister of Popler.
titleStmt.author: Peck, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
